### Introduction

This website is meant to be a resource for users interested in learning more about developing reusable reports using RMarkdown. This site alos contains code snppets to get users started with a variety of data visualizations commonly used in our Department.

To learn more about Quarto websites visit <https://quarto.org/docs/websites>.
